flow.descriptionCdata:
1a4e5845-03e3-450c-9d39-4fefa498422b.32c88a11-2edf-4415-a884-92c08adb6ec4.description=
This is an operation that does nothing. It can be used for filtering flow variables by feeding them in as inputs and filtering them on the results tab.

Inputs\:
field1 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field2 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field3 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field4 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.

Responses\:
success - this operation never fails.
1a4e5845-03e3-450c-9d39-4fefa498422b.38f47ce5-8fd8-4775-808c-1b770ad42fac.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
1a4e5845-03e3-450c-9d39-4fefa498422b.57f635f2-50a6-47f1-b756-bf078010e338.prompt=User Identifier 1a4e5845-03e3-450c-9d39-4fefa498422b.6ab29486-5aad-43c2-aecf-5e60279581c5.description=
Checks to see if a list contains every element in another list.

Inputs\:
sublist -The contained list.
container - The containing list.
delimiter - A delimiter separating elements in the two lists. Default is a comma
ignoreCase - If set to 'True' then the compare is not case sensitive. Default is True

Responses\:
true - sublist is contained in container.
false - sublist is not contained in container.

Results\:
Result - All items contained in the sublist that are not in the container.
1a4e5845-03e3-450c-9d39-4fefa498422b.81cefdc4-6a72-4c4e-a0e7-ca2d7fc05bc4.description=
This is an operation that does nothing. It can be used for filtering flow variables by feeding them in as inputs and filtering them on the results tab.

Inputs\:
field1 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field2 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field3 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field4 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.

Responses\:
success - this operation never fails.
1a4e5845-03e3-450c-9d39-4fefa498422b.8cddc13c-365a-481d-9aad-5f4860964798.description=This workflow returns the Resource provider details. Results\: providerSAP providerUsername providerPassword 1a4e5845-03e3-450c-9d39-4fefa498422b.997364fb-86f2-4919-94e2-2c68b636521f.prompt=Resource Provider ID 1a4e5845-03e3-450c-9d39-4fefa498422b.description=
Thsi workflow gets the subscription context of the created service. The domain of the user is retrieved from the domain of the user configured for the provider.

Inputs\:

csaUser		- CSA User to be used to get the user identifier. If blank, the user will be taken for the CSA_OO_USER system property.
RSC_PROVIDER_ID	- Resource Provider Id for the service request
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID	-  Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time
REQ_ORG_ID	- Organization Id associated with the service request
REQ_USER_ID	-  User Id associated with the service request
RSC_POOL_ID	-  Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time

Responses\:
success - Workflow completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
1a4e5845-03e3-450c-9d39-4fefa498422b.f501ac47-0534-4c3f-910a-cf49bd3d4b2c.prompt=Enter a value for container 1a4e5845-03e3-450c-9d39-4fefa498422b.fd04ac5d-0283-4f4a-b4d2-2cbd616a2b7d.callout=MOE calls for MT require that the user name contains the domain information. If the domain name is not set in the user name of the provider, then MT flow invocations from CSA will fail.
flow.name: Get MOE Subscription Context

scriptlet.name: default
default
